eu.amidst.core.datastream

Interface DataStream<E extends DataInstance>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<E>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DataOnMemory<E>, DataSequence
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataOnMemoryFromFile, DataOnMemoryListContainer, DataStreamFromFile, DynamicDataOnMemoryFromFile, DynamicDataStreamFromFile

    public interface DataStream<E extends DataInstance>
extends Iterable<E>
    The DataStream class is an interface for dealing with data streams.

    The whole AMIDST Toolbox is specially designed to process the data sequentially without loading it into main memory. In this way, this class can handle very large data sets. A DataStream object is composed as a collection of DataInstance objects.

    For an example of use follow this link

    http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#datastreamsexample

    For further details about the implementation of this class using Java 8 functional-style programming look at the following paper:

    Masegosa et al. Probabilistic Graphical Models on Multi-Core CPUs using Java 8. IEEE-CIM (2015).

    • Method Detail

      • getAttributes

        Attributes getAttributes()
        Returns an Attributes object containing the attributes of this DataStream.
        Returns:
        an Attributes object associated with this DataStream.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes this DataStream. It should be invoked only when the processing of the data stream is finished.

      • isRestartable

        boolean isRestartable()
        Returns whether this DataStream can restart. A DataStream can restart if is is possible to iterate over all the data samples once again.
        Returns:
        true if this DataStream can restart.

      • restart

        void restart()
        Restarts this DataStream.

      • stream

        Stream<E> stream()
        Returns a Stream of DataInstance objects to be processed sequentially. That is, without invoking later on any parallel stream method.
        Returns:
        a valid Java stream of DataInstance objects to be processed sequentially.

      • filter

        default DataStream<E> filter(Predicate<? super E> predicate)
        Returns a data stream consisting of the elements of this stream that match the given predicate.

        This is an intermediate operation.

        Parameters:
        predicate - a non-interfering, stateless predicate to apply to each element to determine if it should be included
        Returns:
        the new stream

      • map

        default <R extends DataInstance> DataStream<R> map(Function<? super E,? extends R> mapper)
        Returns a data stream consisting of the results of applying the given function to the elements of this stream.

        This is an intermediate operation.

        Parameters:
        mapper - a non-interfering, stateless function to apply to each element
        Returns:
        the new data stream

      • parallelStream

        default Stream<E> parallelStream(int batchSize)
        Returns a Stream of DataInstance objects to be processed in parallel. Internally, data samples are grouped into batches and all the samples in the same batch are processed with the same thread.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the size of the batches.
        Returns:
        a valid Java stream of DataInstance object to be processed in parallel.

      • iterator

        default Iterator<E> iterator()
        Returns an Iterator object that iterates over all the data instances of this DataStream.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface Iterable<E extends DataInstance>
        Returns:
        an Iterator over DataInstances.

      • iterableOverBatches

        default Iterable<DataOnMemory<E>> iterableOverBatches(int batchSize)
        Returns an iterator over DataOnMemory objects. Each DataOnMemory object contains a batch of data.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the size of the data batches.
        Returns:
        an Iterator over DataOnMemory objects.

      • streamOfBatches

        default Stream<DataOnMemory<E>> streamOfBatches(int batchSize)
        Returns a stream of DataOnMemory objects. Each DataOnMemory object contains a batch of data.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the size of the data batches.
        Returns:
        a stream of DataOnMemory objects.

      • parallelStreamOfBatches

        default Stream<DataOnMemory<E>> parallelStreamOfBatches(int batchSize)
        Returns a parallel stream of DataOnMemory objects. Each DataOnMemory object contains a batch of data.
        Parameters:
        batchSize - the size of the data batches.
        Returns:
        a parallel stream of DataOnMemory objects.
